resources.string: In Download Page, we will use RecyclerView to list out all previous download record user had made. And when user clicks any of the items, the activity will create an intent with the music URI to the now playing activity and play it right the way.

In Favorite Page, we will use RecyclerView to list out all song or audio previously marked as favorite. And when user clicks any of the items, the activity will create an intent with the music URI to the now playing activity and play it right the way.

In My Music Page, we will use RecyclerView to list out all user\'s music. And when user clicks any of the items, the activity will create an intent with the music URI to the now playing activity and play it right the way.
